NPCs.STR_START_COLLIDER_TRAPS: Unfortunately you have activated the snare automatically, be aware above your head and the traps at your feet. Disable points will be placed on your way. Good luck!!!
NPCs.STR_END_COLLIDER_TRAPS: Congratulations!! You have turned off the automatic trap system. Good luck !!
NPCs.STR_COLLIDER_CHEST_CONVERT_CONTENT: You have found the exchange chest. Here you can exchange the gold you earned for life (500 gold = 1 life)
NPCs.STR_COLLIDER_CHEST_NOT_ENOUGH_GOLD: Unfortunately you do not have enough gold to turn into live
NPCs.STR_COLLIDER_CHEST_TAKE_GOLD: You have received XXX gold. Look for a chest with a heart sign to convert it into live
NPCs.STR_COLLIDER_CHEST_TAKE_LIVE: You have received XXX live. Use them skillfully !!
